name: Ursus 6
description:
The 6th adventure of Ursus, an epic, difficult (and sometimes even frustrating) platform game with a bear cub who must save the world from the evil Arzar!

Commands: E,R,T,D,F,G, and the mouse.

Requirements: some less than 7 years old computer, preferentially with a dedicated graphic card and any Windows (from 98 to 8 included), or Linux

Official website: http://www.volatiledove.com
